org.smtlib

Interface Log.IListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JUnitListener, Log.StandardListener
    Enclosing class:
    Log

    public static interface Log.IListener
    This is an interface to be implemented by any Object that wants to hear log messages; the Object must register itself by calling Log.addListener.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void indent(java.lang.String chars)
      The character sequence with which to start any log line
      void logDiag(java.lang.String msg)
      Called when a message is sent to the SMT-LIB diagnostic output (it is expected that a line termination will be added)
      void logError(IResponse.IError result)
      Called when an IError is being recorded on the normal output - the listener has the opportunity to record error location information as well
      void logError(java.lang.String msg)
      Called when an error is being recorded on the normal output (it is expected that a line termination will be added)
      void logOut(IResponse result)
      Called when a response it logged to the normal output (it is expected that a line termination will be added); the argument is converted to text using the defaultPrinter in the smt configuration.
      void logOut(java.lang.String msg)
      Called when messages are logged to the normal output.
